name: Wiki.js
description: An open source, modern and powerful wiki app built on Node.js, Git and Markdown.

HOST.description: Full URL of your Wiki app

LANG.description: UI Language (en, de, es, fr, ko, pt, ru, zh)

IS_PUBLIC.description: Is the wiki publicly accessible? (without login)

GIT_URL.description: URL of the remote git repository

GIT_BRANCH.description: Branch of the remote git repository to use

GIT_USERNAME.description: Username to access the remote git repository

GIT_PASSWORD.description: Password / PAT / Deploy Key to access the remote git repository

SERVER_EMAIL.description: Default email to use as commit author

SHOW_USER_EMAIL.description: Whether to use user email as author in commits

IS_HEROKU.description: Do not change. Required by Wiki.js
